original_text: And in the morning, behold, it was Leah! And Jacob said to Laban, “What is this you have done to me? Did I not serve with you for Rachel? Why then have you deceived me?”
korean_text: 야곱이 아침에 보니 레아라 라반에게 이르되 외삼촌이 어찌하여 내게 이같이 행하셨나이까 내가 라헬을 위하여 외삼촌을 섬기지 아니하였나이까 외삼촌이 나를 속이심은 어찌됨이니이까

sentences.original_text: And in the morning, behold, it was Leah!
sentences.korean_translation: 아침이 되었을 때, 보라, 그것은 레아였다!

sentences.original_text: What is this you have done to me?
Did I not serve with you for Rachel?
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 라헬을 위하여 너와 함께 섬기지 않았느냐?

sentences.original_text: Why then have you deceived me?
